## BitcoinsMoneyp.getVaults() method

Get a slice from the list of Vaults.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getVaults(params: VaultListingParams, overrides?: BitcoinsCallOverrides): Promise<UserVault[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | [VaultListingParams](./lib-base.vaultlistingparams.md) | Controls how the list is sorted, and where the slice begins and ends. |
|  overrides | [BitcoinsCallOverrides](./lib-ethers.bitcoinscalloverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[UserVault](./lib-base.uservault.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

Pairs of owner addresses and their Vaults.
